Apps

Class WarByArrays

  • java.lang.Object
    • Apps.WarByArrays

  • public class WarByArrays
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulation of card game war. In the simulation, we use array circular list queues and array stacks. The card game WarByArrays for two players.

    • Field Summary

      • give

        public void give(StackADT<Card> stack1,
                 StackADT<Card> stack2,
                 QueueADT<Card> winner)
        Give all of the Cards played to the winning player.
        Parameters:
        stack1 - the card stack in front of player 1
        stack2 - the card stack in front of player 2
        winner - the card pile of winner's hands

      • settledByWar

        public boolean settledByWar(StackADT<Card> stack1,
                            StackADT<Card> stack2)
        Play a war over stack1 and stack2. If this ends the game because one player runs out of cards, give the cards to the winning player and return true. Otherwise, return false.
        Parameters:
        stack1 - the card stack in front of player 1
        stack2 - the card stack in front of player 2
        Returns:
        is settled by war?

        Parameters:
